name: BERNUNÇA
description:
''BERNANCE'''

The first painting in a series of two, designed to celebrate the folclore of Santa Catarina, Brasil.

The painting represents the folkloric figure of the Boi de Mamão, Bernunça.

Bernunça is almost a dragon, like a monster that eats everything in its path. She is accompanied by Maricota, another character from Boi de Mamão, who is a very tall blonde woman, who twirls and waves her long arms.

Acrylic on canvas
20x30

by ZALA
